name: Glaive Rush
description: You throw your entire body into a reckless charge. Make a melee attack roll with advantage, dealing 2d10 + MOVE dragon damage on a hit. Until the start of your next turn, attack rolls made against you have advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
